articles.author: Gina Kolata
articles.title: A Cure for Type 1 Diabetes? For One Man, It Seems to Have Worked. - The New York Times
articles.description: A new treatment using stem cells that produce insulin has surprised experts and given them hope for the 1.5 million Americans living with the disease.
articles.content:
After years when nothing worked, a small team of researchers, including Felicia Pagliuca, a postdoctoral researcher, was in the lab one night in 2014, doing one more experiment.
We werent very optim… [+1232 chars]

articles.title: Omicron variant in 'fluid motion', scientists coordinating with South Africa: Dr Anthony Fauci - India Today
articles.description: Dr Anthony Fauci, America's leading infectious disease expert, stated that the new Covid-19 Omicron variant is in 'fluid motion' and that US scientists are coordinating with South African scientists.

articles.title: West Side Story lyricist Stephen Sondheim dies aged 91 - Stuff.co.nz
articles.description: Stephen Sondheim, the songwriter who reshaped the American musical theatre with his intelligent lyrics and use of evocative melodies, has died aged 91.
articles.content: Stephen Sondheim, the songwriter who reshaped the American musical theatre in the second half of the 20th century with his intelligent, intricately rhymed lyrics, his use of evocative melodies and hi… [+14145 chars]

articles.title: Shake the habit of spending too long sitting, your mental health will thank you - Malay Mail

articles.content:
Scientists find that sitting more is linked to increased feelings of depression and anxiety. Picture courtesy of eclipse_images / Getty Images
